#summary loading flash from different url location.

= Basic: =
   This is the simple loading file using php script and it load different location file that use the header from php script.


{{{
<?php
$filename = 'main.swf';
//$filename = 'download/main.swf';
header("Content-Type:application/x-shockwave-flash");
#header("Content-Disposition: attachment;filename=$filename");//this download file
header('Pragma: no-cache');
header('Expires: 0');
readfile($filename);
?>
}}}
